scripts.watch-server: cross-env DEV=1 nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch server/src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node server/src
scripts.watch-server-proxied: cross-env FRONTEND_PROXY=3005 ADMIN_PROXY=3006 npm run watch-server
scripts.build-all: npm audit --omit=dev && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run build-shared && npm run build-server && npm run build-form && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin && echo COMPLETED
scripts.build-server: rm -rf dist/src dist/plugins && tsc --target es2018 && cp -v -r package-lock.json server/package.json READ* LICENSE* plugins dist && cd dist && npm ci --production && npm i -f @node-rs/crc32-win32-x64-msvc && cd .. && node afterbuild
scripts.dist-win: pkg . -C gzip -t node16-win && cd dist && zip hfs-windows.zip hfs.exe -r plugins
scripts.dist-bin: pkg . -C gzip && cd dist && mv -f hfs-win.exe hfs.exe && zip hfs-windows.zip hfs.exe -r plugins && cp -f hfs-linux hfs && zip hfs-linux.zip hfs -r plugins && cp -f hfs-macos hfs && zip hfs-macos.zip hfs -r plugins && rm hfs
scripts.dist: npm run build-all && npm run dist-node && npm run dist-bin
